  • listAddresses :: (IsOurs s, CompareDiscovery s, KnownAddresses s, DefineTx t) => WalletId -> ExceptT ErrNoSuchWallet IO [(Address, AddressState)]
  • createUnsignedTx :: forall e. (DefineTx t, e ~ ErrValidateSelection t) => WalletId -> NonEmpty TxOut -> ExceptT (ErrCreateUnsignedTx e) IO CoinSelection
  • estimateTxFee :: forall e. (DefineTx t, e ~ ErrValidateSelection t) => WalletId -> NonEmpty TxOut -> ExceptT (ErrEstimateTxFee e) IO Fee
  • listUtxoStatistics :: DefineTx t => WalletId -> ExceptT ErrListUTxOStatistics IO UTxOStatistics
  • signTx :: (Show s, NFData s, IsOwned s k, GenChange s) => WalletId -> Passphrase "encryption" -> CoinSelection -> ExceptT ErrSignTx IO (Tx t, TxMeta, [TxWitness])
  • submitTx :: DefineTx t => WalletId -> (Tx t, TxMeta, [TxWitness]) -> ExceptT ErrSubmitTx IO ()
  • submitExternalTx :: ByteString -> ExceptT ErrSubmitExternalTx IO (Tx t)
  • listTransactions :: DefineTx t => WalletId -> Maybe UTCTime -> Maybe UTCTime -> SortOrder -> ExceptT ErrListTransactions IO [TransactionInfo]
  • attachPrivateKey :: WalletKey k => WalletId -> (k RootK XPrv, Passphrase "encryption") -> ExceptT ErrNoSuchWallet IO ()
}

data BlockchainParameters t = BlockchainParameters {
  • getGenesisBlock :: Block (Tx t)
  • getGenesisBlockDate :: StartTime
  • getFeePolicy :: FeePolicy
  • getSlotLength :: SlotLength
  • getEpochLength :: EpochLength
  • getTxMaxSize :: Quantity "byte" Word16
  • getEpochStability :: Quantity "block" Word32
}

data ErrCoinSelection e
  • = ErrNotEnoughMoney Word64 Word64
  • | ErrUtxoNotEnoughFragmented Word64 Word64
  • | ErrMaximumInputsReached Word64
  • | ErrInputsDepleted
  • | ErrInvalidSelection e
name: ErrCoinSelection ErrNotEnoughMoney ErrUtxoNotEnoughFragmented ErrMaximumInputsReached ErrInputsDepleted ErrInvalidSelection

display_html: newWalletLayer :: forall s t k. Buildable (Tx t) => Trace IO Text -> BlockchainParameters t -> DBLayer IO s t k -> NetworkLayer t IO -> TransactionLayer t k -> IO (WalletLayer s t k)
name: newWalletLayer

display_html: newtype ApiMnemonicT (sizes :: [Nat]) (purpose :: Symbol) = ApiMnemonicT (Passphrase purpose, [Text])
name: ApiMnemonicT ApiMnemonicT

display_html: type Api t = Addresses t :<|> (Wallets :<|> Transactions t)
name: Api

display_html: type ListAddresses t = "wallets" :> (Capture "walletId" (ApiT WalletId) :> ("addresses" :> (QueryParam "state" (ApiT AddressState) :> Get '[JSON] [ApiAddress t])))
name: ListAddresses

display_html: type DeleteWallet = "wallets" :> (Capture "walletId" (ApiT WalletId) :> DeleteNoContent '[Any] NoContent)
name: DeleteWallet

display_html: type PutWalletPassphrase = "wallets" :> (Capture "walletId" (ApiT WalletId) :> ("passphrase" :> (ReqBody '[JSON] WalletPutPassphraseData :> PutNoContent '[Any] NoContent)))
name: PutWalletPassphrase

display_html: type Transactions t = CreateTransaction t :<|> (ListTransactions t :<|> (PostTransactionFee t :<|> PostExternalTransaction))
name: Transactions

display_html: type CreateTransaction t = "wallets" :> (Capture "walletId" (ApiT WalletId) :> ("transactions" :> (ReqBody '[JSON] (PostTransactionData t) :> PostAccepted '[JSON] (ApiTransaction t))))
name: CreateTransaction

display_html: type ListTransactions t = "wallets" :> (Capture "walletId" (ApiT WalletId) :> ("transactions" :> (QueryParam "start" Iso8601Time :> (QueryParam "end" Iso8601Time :> (QueryParam "order" (ApiT SortOrder) :> Get '[JSON] [ApiTransaction t])))))
name: ListTransactions

display_html: start :: forall t k. (DefineTx t, KeyToAddress t k, k ~ SeqKey, EncodeAddress t, DecodeAddress t, Buildable (ErrValidateSelection t)) => Settings -> Trace IO Text -> Socket -> WalletLayer (SeqState t) t k -> IO ()
name: start
